perturbation.original_text: The Parties agree to develop a list of target cooperation projects and common goals, and consequent agreements if required, within six (6) Months of signing this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Parties agree to develop a list of target cooperation projects and common goals, and consequent agreements if required, within three (3) Months of signing this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the time frame for developing the cooperation projects. Section 2 initially states six months, while the modified version changes it to three months, creating uncertainty and potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement shall be one (1) year unless terminated earlier in accordance with the terms of this Agreement (the "Term").
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement shall be two (2) year unless terminated earlier in accordance with the terms of this Agreement (the "Term").
perturbation.explanation: The original term of the agreement is one year, but it is now changed to two. This creates confusion regarding the length of commitment between the parties.

perturbation.original_text: The Parties may terminate its performance of related obligations under this Agreement within thirty (30) days of receipt by the Party of written termination notice.
perturbation.changed_text: The Parties may terminate its performance of related obligations under this Agreement within fifteen (15) days of receipt by the Party of written termination notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original termination notice period is thirty days. This is changed to fifteen days, creating conflicting instructions about the early termination period.
